scripts.predev: bun run db:cleanup && bun run db:up && bun run db:wait && bun run db:create && bun run db:migrate
scripts.dev: concurrently --kill-others "DB_HOST=localhost DB_PORT=23798 DB_NAME=indexer DB_USER=postgres DB_PASS=postgres sqd process:dev" "DB_HOST=localhost DB_PORT=23798 DB_NAME=indexer DB_USER=postgres DB_PASS=postgres GQL_PORT=4350 sqd serve" "DB_PORT=23798 bun run api:all"
scripts.dev:skip-setup: concurrently --kill-others "DB_HOST=localhost DB_PORT=23798 DB_NAME=indexer DB_USER=postgres DB_PASS=postgres sqd process:dev" "DB_HOST=localhost DB_PORT=23798 DB_NAME=indexer DB_USER=postgres DB_PASS=postgres GQL_PORT=4350 sqd serve" "DB_PORT=23798 bun run api:all"
scripts.dev:indexer: concurrently --kill-others "DB_HOST=localhost DB_PORT=23798 DB_NAME=indexer DB_USER=postgres DB_PASS=postgres sqd process:dev" "DB_HOST=localhost DB_PORT=23798 DB_NAME=indexer DB_USER=postgres DB_PASS=postgres GQL_PORT=4350 sqd serve"
scripts.db:wait: until docker exec squid-db-1 pg_isready -U postgres 2>/dev/null; do echo 'Waiting for database...'; sleep 1; done
scripts.db:create: docker exec squid-db-1 psql -U postgres -c 'CREATE DATABASE indexer;' || docker exec squid-db-1 psql -U postgres -c 'SELECT 1' > /dev/null
scripts.db:migrate: DB_HOST=localhost DB_PORT=23798 DB_NAME=indexer DB_USER=postgres DB_PASS=postgres sqd migration:apply
scripts.db:reset: bun run db:down && bun run db:up && bun run db:wait && bun run db:create && bun run db:migrate
scripts.test:all: bun run test && bun run test:data && bun run test:e2e
